reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Horwitz is very experienced and knowledgeable. He is unusually proactive, often giving tips and guidance about what to expect next for kids development. He's also absolutely great with children. My daughter was laughing so hard, she didn't even notice the two vaccine shots she got last visit.

All 3 of my boys have been going to Pediatric Associates since birth. While we are relatively new to Dr Horowitz, I find him very pleasant and feel our well visits are pretty thorough. The practice is pretty efficient but I never feel rushed when he sees my boys

Dr. Horwitz is a very thorough and caring doctor who has been the primary care physician for both of my young children. He was instrumental in identifying a significant issue for one of my children, and has been helpful for myriad smaller things as well.
Dr. Horwitz was amazing! He was thorough, took his time, and made us feel at ease.

He was kind and conscientious, helping put a nervous 7-year-old patient at ease, and thorough in his examination of her inner ear issue while still being gentle enough to not hurt or upset her. No complaints at all!
Dr. Horwitz is always thorough and friendly.  He has been my boys doctor since both and shows that he really cares For children.

He is wonderful with babies- very informative, pleasant and thorough. He is patient and made sure to answer all of my questions. He was also hesitant on putting my son on antibiotics which I appreciated- he was thoughtful in his decisions and how best to treat my baby.
He is very knowledgeable and explains things very clearly

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. O’ Brien continues to review my health markers to keep me in the best health possible.

Dr. O'Brien is the consummate professional.  He is smart and thorough.  He is a great diagnostician.  He has a great bedside manner and shows compassion and empathy for his patients.  He instills you with confidence in his ability.  I would trust him with my life.
Dr. O Brien is the best. He cares about your health and well being. I would definitely recommend him.
explains everything so you understand kind  and knowledgable
Great doctor. Takes you on time. Fast blood test results. Good communicator.
He is very thorough and answers all of your questions.
Dr O'Brien is knowledgeable, caring and listens to my concerns
Excellent

schools.name: New York Univ Sch Of Med

reviewDetails.comment: I would recommend, and have recommended, Dr. Kinkhabwala to everyone.

Dr. Kinkhabwala has been my internal medicine doctor for over a decade.  He is thoughtful and attentive to my individual health needs.  I trust his guidance and challenges me to think differently about how I can manage my own heath.  Definitely recommend him to all of my friends and family (as I have already done!)
He was excellent
He is a good doctor and the service is very nice

Dr. Kinkhabwala is fantastic.  He is very responsive, always starts on time (or more on time than any other doctor I have), knowledgeable, cares about his patients and has a great network of specialists if you need them.
Great doctor! East to talk to you and makes you feel comfortable talking about personal topic! Would recommend to everyone, especially people who do not like going to the doctor

Dr. Kinkhabwala has been my primary care physician for two years now and he has been excellent. He is a very nice individual and extremely knowledgeable. Any question I have he is able to quickly answer and is very thorough in his examination. Would recommend to others.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Lee is very  attentive and listen well. I felt very cared for and not rushed.
She is outstanding. Best eye doctor I’ve seen!
Attentive, competent
Dr. Lee was professional and friendly. She went through the different options for my prescription, and helped me decide on the better choice based on my lifestyle.
Very knowledgeable, friendly, professional, takes her time to answer all questions and discussed all options.
Dr Lee is personable, patient, and skilled in her field. I would recommend her services without hesitation.
Excellent Doctor ! Very professional, very informative, more than helpful and extremely thorough in her practice. Would absolutely recommend.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Shapiro is a great doctor, very professional. I would recommend him to my friends and family .
Dr. Shapiro explains in great detail the results of your examination.

The visit went very well, the staff was organized and friendly and the wait time was acceptable. 

The Doctor was very nice, professional and knowledgeable.
Dr. Shapiro is pleasant and thorough.  I have no hesitation in recommending him.

Dr Shapiro was attentive to all my questions and concerns .
He made me feel comfortable
Dr. Shapiro was friendly and helpful, with good explanations and advice.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Barnes has provided meaningful 1:1 service over the years as the practice has transitioned through a variety of provider networks.  My level of service hasn't changed from the onset; stellar ever since.
I have been going to Dr. Barnes for quite a few years, and I think he is terrific!  I would definitely reommend him, and I have!
Dr. Barnes is very professional and thorough!  He is very recommended!!
Highly recommend Dr. Barnes. Very thorough and caring doctor experience.
Have dine 2 virtual visits w/Dr. Barnes in which he was very helpful.

Dr Barnes has never let me down. He supported my husband and I through Covid, he follows up and makes himself accessible as needed. There’s always time fir questions. An old fashioned doctor who knows who I am and thoroughly treats me as an individual.
Very thorough, efficient, and gets the job done in a timely fashion. He is very caring for his patients!

reviewDetails.comment:
Dr Wysell explained dx.  Was a good listener.
Very pleasant

I only had my initial visit with Dr. Wysell so far. She asked many questions to ascertain my condition and determine a course of action. She also ordered blood work to confirm or rule out other things that might be contributing to my condition. I found Dr. Wysell friendly and easy to talk to. Having only seen her once to date I'm pleased with the care I've received.
